# DarkWave Studios Product Roadmap

**Version 1.21.0 | Updated December 2025**

---

## Vision Timeline

```
2025 ─────────────── 2026 ─────────────── 2027 ─────────────── 2028
  │                    │                    │                    │
  ▼                    ▼                    ▼                    ▼
Platform            Token                Mobile              Scale
Complete            Launch               Apps                Global
```

---

## Phase 1: Foundation (2025) ✅ COMPLETE

### Q3-Q4 2025

| Milestone | Status | Description |
|-----------|--------|-------------|
| Core Platform | ✅ | Web application fully operational |
| 18 AI Agents | ✅ | Complete roster with unique personalities |
| Real-Time Data | ✅ | CoinGecko Pro API integration |
| Blockchain Audit | ✅ | Solana mainnet integration |
| Telegram Bot | ✅ | 24/7 availability |
| Knowledge Base | ✅ | 8 chapters, 143 terms |
| Payment System | ✅ | Stripe integration ready |
| Authentication | ✅ | Email whitelist + access codes |
| Biometric Auth | ✅ | WebAuthn fingerprint/Face ID for login & wallet |
| Secure Sessions | ✅ | Auto-rotating tokens, tier-based durations |
| Multi-Chain Wallet | ✅ | Solana + 22 EVM chains with biometric confirmation |

---

## Phase 2: Token Launch (Q1 2026)

### February 14, 2026 - V2 Founders Launch

**Week 1-2: Pre-Launch**
- [ ] DWAV smart contract audit
- [ ] Liquidity pool preparation
- [ ] Marketing campaign launch
- [ ] Influencer partnerships activated

**February 14: Launch Day**
- [ ] DWAV token live on Solana
- [ ] Legacy Founder tier open ($4/month)
- [ ] 35,000 DWAV reward distribution
- [ ] Staking platform activated

**Week 3-4: Post-Launch**
- [ ] Jupiter DEX listing
- [ ] CoinGecko listing application
- [ ] Community AMA events
- [ ] Bug fixes and optimizations

### March 2026

| Feature | Priority | Description |
|---------|----------|-------------|
| Staking Dashboard | High | Visual staking interface with rewards tracker |
| NFT Trading Cards V2 | Medium | Enhanced collectibles with utility |
| Referral Program | High | 1 month free for referrals |
| Mobile Web Optimization | Medium | PWA improvements |

---

## Phase 3: Mobile Expansion (Q2 2026)

### April 2026

| Milestone | Platform | Features |
|-----------|----------|----------|
| iOS Beta | TestFlight | Core features, beta testers only |
| Android Beta | Play Store | Core features, beta testers only |
| Push Notifications | Both | Price alerts, signal notifications |

### May 2026

| Milestone | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| iOS Public Launch | App Store release |
| Android Public Launch | Play Store release |
| Widget Support | Home screen price widgets |
| Biometric Auth | Face ID / Fingerprint login |

### June 2026

| Milestone | Description |
|-----------|-------------|
| Offline Mode | Cached watchlist and charts |
| Apple Watch | Price complication |
| Cross-Platform Sync | Seamless web/mobile experience |

---

## Phase 4: Growth & Scale (Q3-Q4 2026)

### Q3 2026

**AI Enhancements**
- [ ] Custom fine-tuned trading models
- [ ] Agent collaboration features
- [ ] Backtesting capabilities
- [ ] Signal accuracy tracking

**Platform Features**
- [ ] Portfolio tracking integration
- [ ] Exchange API connections
- [ ] Advanced charting tools
- [ ] Social trading features

### Q4 2026

**Enterprise Features**
- [ ] API access for institutions
- [ ] White-label solutions
- [ ] Custom agent development
- [ ] SLA-backed support tiers

**Community**
- [ ] DAO governance launch
- [ ] Community proposals system
- [ ] Treasury management voting
- [ ] Ambassador program

---

## Phase 5: Ecosystem Expansion (2027)

### H1 2027

| Initiative | Description |
|------------|-------------|
| Multi-Chain | Ethereum, Arbitrum, Base support |
| DeFi Integration | DEX aggregation, yield farming |
| New Products | Additional DarkWave Studios apps |
| International | Multi-language support |

### H2 2027

| Initiative | Description |
|------------|-------------|
| AI Marketplace | Third-party agent creation |
| Data Partnerships | Premium data feed integrations |
| Institutional Tier | Enterprise-grade offerings |
| 100K Users | Major milestone celebration |

---

## Phase 6: Market Leadership (2028)

### Goals

- 250,000+ active users
- $10M+ ARR
- Top 10 crypto trading tool
- Full mobile feature parity
- Global brand recognition

### Initiatives

- Acquisition opportunities
- IPO/token event considerations
- Strategic partnerships
- Platform acquisitions

---

## Feature Priority Matrix

### Must Have (P0)
- DWAV token launch
- Staking platform
- Mobile apps
- Payment processing

### Should Have (P1)
- NFT Trading Cards V2
- Referral program
- Advanced charting
- Portfolio tracking

### Nice to Have (P2)
- Exchange integrations
- Social trading
- AI marketplace
- White-label

## Success Metrics

### Q1 2026 Targets
| Metric | Target |
|--------|--------|
| Registered Users | 5,000 |
| Paying Subscribers | 1,000 |
| DWAV Holders | 2,500 |
| Monthly Revenue | $25,000 |

### Q2 2026 Targets
| Metric | Target |
|--------|--------|
| Registered Users | 15,000 |
| Paying Subscribers | 3,500 |
| Mobile Downloads | 5,000 |
| Monthly Revenue | $50,000 |

### EOY 2026 Targets
| Metric | Target |
|--------|--------|
| Registered Users | 50,000 |
| Paying Subscribers | 15,000 |
| DWAV Staked | 20M tokens |
| Annual Revenue | $1.5M |

---

## Risk Mitigation

| Risk | Mitigation Strategy |
|------|---------------------|
| Development delays | Buffer time in all estimates |
| Market conditions | Diversified revenue streams |
| Competition | Continuous innovation |
| Regulatory | Legal counsel engagement |

---

## Update Schedule

This roadmap is reviewed and updated:
- Weekly: Internal team review
- Monthly: Public update on progress
- Quarterly: Major revision if needed

**Last Updated:** December 17, 2025  
**Next Review:** January 17, 2026
